These pens actually caused a big kerfuffle in the Quilting world a few years ago. People realized the ink just vanished when you ironed it, so they exploded onto the quilting scene and were crazy popular...
Until a quilting expo in California.
All the quilters packed up their prize quilts they'd been working on, they were packed into the cargo hold of their planes... and when they arrived at the show and pulled their quilts out... ALL of the lines from the pens had reappeared, because the quilts had gotten cold enough in the cargo holds of the planes to make the ink show up again.
